title: School newspaper - the clothes make the man

content.description: Directions: You will now listen to a dialogue. Afterwards, you will be asked several questions about what you have just heard. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices. Now listen to the dialogue.
content.question: Que reflètent les vêtements d’Henri?

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
